casebody.data:
LEHIGH VALLEY RAILROAD COMPANY, A CORPORATION, PROSECUTOR, v. THE BOARD OF PUBLIC UTILITY COMMISSIONERS ET AL., DEFENDANTS. Argued May 21, 1927 Decided May 31, 1927.

Before Justices Treno hard, Kalisch and Katzenbaoh.

Pot the applicant, Hobart & Minará. Eor the board of public utility commissioners, John O. Bigelow. Eor the county of Somerset, John F. Reger. Eor the township of Hillsborough, Clarkson A. Cranmer. Per Curiam.

The application for the writ of certiorari is denied.
